2nd and 3rd game I had 2 feeders. In the 2nd game lux was the feeder, and supposedly i "took her lane" and just decided to feed nidalee, In the 3rd game the feeder was varus, where he called me an asshole and ran it down top lane and fed. why the hell was I banned? In the 1st game I was pretty toxic though, that was my bad. But the fact that someone was able to int, and get enough reports for me to get banned?

replies.body:
From what I'm seeing, it really looks like you're not using the chat positively in your games. If a teammate is not having a good game you should work with them, try and cover their weaknesses. Not point out their faults and telling everyone to FF. If somebody is actually inting or abusing you, it's better to mute them so you don't have to see their chat, then report them to us in post game so we can stop em. <:(

If you'd like a more detailed discussion, it'd be a better idea to reach out to Behavior and talk about the punishment with them in a ticket [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). That way you can get the most info and talk about it in private as well.
